cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the phase retrieval problem, which is a fundamental problem in signal processing and imaging. The paper presents a new proof for the PhaseMax algorithm, which is a convex formulation for phase retrieval via linear programming in the natural parameter space. This suggests that the paper is likely to be relevant to several sub-categories in computer science, including information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), numerical analysis (cs.NA), and signal processing (cs.SI).
